thread.title: Amazon: Tons Of FREE Minecraft eBooks
thread.title_full: Amazon: Tons Of FREE Minecraft eBooks

author: Hannah (Sensational Sidekick)
title: Amazon: Tons Of FREE Minecraft eBooks
text:
Calling all Minecraft fans! Hop on over to Amazon where you can download TONS of FREE Minecraft eBooks . These would be great to load on your kiddo’s Kindle or tablet to read on long road trips!
If you don’t have a Kindle, keep in mind that you can still read books on your computer or other mobile devices with the FREE Kindle Reading Apps found here . 
(Thanks, Shop The Hot Deals !)
